content.rendered:
Tyler Hoechlin plays the world’s most famous superhero and Elizabeth Tulloch the most famous journalist in the comic book world, who has to cope with the stress, pressure and all the intricacies that working parents face today.

Number of seasons: 2 (2021- )

Status: Ongoing

Creators: Greg Berlann, Todd Helbing

Channel: The CW

Starring: Tyler Hoechlin, Elizabeth Tulloch, Jordan Elsass
